TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebBrowser extends System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserBase

summary.span: 使用户能够在你的窗体中导航网页。

span.span: Enables the user to navigate Web pages inside your form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件允许您承载网页和 Windows 窗体应用程序中其他启用浏览器的文档。The control lets you host Web pages and other browser-enabled documents in your Windows Forms applications. 可以使用控制，例如，若要提供集成的基于 HTML 的用户协助或 Web 应用程序中的浏览功能。You can use the control, for example, to provide integrated HTML-based user assistance or Web browsing capabilities in your application. 此外，还可以使用控件将你现有的基于 Web 的控件添加到 Windows 窗体客户端应用程序。Additionally, you can use the control to add your existing Web-based controls to your Windows Forms client applications. > [!IMPORTANT] > 控件是占用大量资源。The control is resource-intensive. 请务必调用方法完成后使用该控件以确保及时释放所有资源。Be sure to call the method when you are finished using the control to ensure that all resources are released in a timely fashion. 必须调用附加事件，应始终为消息的同一线程或用户界面 (UI) 线程上的方法。You must call the method on the same thread that attached the events, which should always be the message or user-interface (UI) thread. 控件不能由部分受信任的代码。The control cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). 控件具有多个属性、 方法和与导航相关的事件。The control has several properties, methods, and events related to navigation. 以下成员可以将控件导航到特定的 URL、 向后移动和前进导航历史记录列表，以及加载主页和当前用户的搜索页：The following members let you navigate the control to a specific URL, move backward and forward through the navigation history list, and load the home page and search page of the current user: - - - - - - 如果导航不成功，会显示一个页面，指示该问题。If the navigation is unsuccessful, a page indicating the problem is displayed. 使用这些成员原因的任何导航， ，和在导航的不同阶段发生的事件。Navigation with any of these members causes the , , and events to occur at different stages of navigation. 这些和其他成员，如和方法，使您可以在 Internet Explorer 中类似的应用程序中实现用户界面控件。These and other members, such as the and methods, let you implement user interface controls in your application similar to those in Internet Explorer. 一些成员将非常有用，即使您不想要显示窗体上的控件。Some members are useful even when you do not want to display the control on your form. 例如，可以使用方法打印网页的最新版本，而不向用户显示页面。For example, you can use the method to print the latest version of a Web page without displaying the page to the user. 控件，您还可以显示在应用程序中创建或检索从数据库或资源文件的内容。The control also lets you display content that you create in your application or you retrieve from a database or resource file. 使用或属性来获取或设置当前文档的内容作为字符串或数据的流。Use the or property to get or set the contents of the current document as a string or data stream. 你还能够通过 Web 页面的内容属性，其中包含提供托管的 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 对用于访问当前页的对象。You can also manipulate the contents of a Web page through the property, which contains an object that provides managed access to the HTML document object model (DOM) for the current page. 结合使用时，此属性非常有用，属性，以在 Web 页中，让你组合基于 Web 的控件和 Windows 窗体控件中的实现你的应用程序代码和动态 HTML (DHTML) 代码之间的双向通信一个用户界面。This property is useful, when used in combination with the property, to implement two-way communication between your application code and dynamic HTML (DHTML) code in a Web page, letting you combine Web-based controls and Windows Forms controls in a single user interface. 可以使用属性来从应用程序中调用代码的脚本方法。You can use the property to call scripting code methods from your application. 在脚本编写的代码可以访问你的应用程序通过`window.external`对象，这是用于进行主机访问提供的内置 DOM 对象，它映射到为指定的对象属性。Your scripting code can access your application through the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access, and which maps to the object that you specify for the property. 控件是一个托管的包装的 ActiveX [WebBrowser 控件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198812)，并使用用户的计算机上安装任何版本的控件。The control is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX [WebBrowser control](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198812), and uses whichever version of the control is installed on the user's computer. > [!NOTE] > 此类，可以在类级别的安全要求。This class makes security demands at the class level. 一个派生的类或调用堆栈中的任何调用方没有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when a derived class or any caller in the call stack does not have full trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 类仅可在线程设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法将标有属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现与一起使用的地址栏控件。The following code example demonstrates how to implement an address bar for use with the control. 此示例要求有一个包含窗体控件称为`webBrowser1`、 一个控件调用`TextBoxAddress`，和一个控件调用`ButtonGo`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 当在文本框中键入的 URL 并按 ENTER 或单击**转**按钮，控件导航到指定的 URL。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 导航时通过单击超链接，在文本框中将会自动更新以显示当前的 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件自动导航到拖放到它上面的文档。By default, the control automatically navigates to documents that are dropped onto it. 作为泛型浏览器使用控件时，此行为很有用。This behavior is useful when you use the control as a generic browser. 如果该控件用于显示专门为你的应用程序而设计的内容，如基于 HTML 的用户的帮助，将设置属性设置为`false`以防止其他内容的显示。If you use the control to display content designed specifically for your application, such as HTML-based user assistance, set the property to `false` to prevent the display of other content. 这是特别有用的当你想要隐藏正在使用的事实控件，例如若要创建无缝结合了基于 Web 的控件与 Windows 窗体控件的用户界面。This is particularly useful when you want to conceal the fact that you are using the control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines Web-based controls with Windows Forms controls. 可以通过设置禁用其他标准的浏览器功能并属性设置为`false`。You can disable other standard browser features by setting the and properties to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 此属性与无关属性不会导致进行拖放事件如事件发生后的控件。This property is not related to the property and does not cause drag-and-drop events such as the event to occur for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示导航历史记录中的上一页是否可用，如果可用， 方法才能成功。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a previous page in navigation history is available, which allows the method to succeed.

value.span: 如果控件可以向后导航，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can navigate backward; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法定位如果有可用控制转移到此历史记录中的上一页。The method navigates the control to the previous page in this history, if one is available. 使用属性来确定导航历史记录是否可用以及是否包含前一页。Use the property to determine whether navigation history is available and contains a previous page. 如果此属性为`true`，则方法将会成功。If this property is `true`, the method will succeed. 否则，调用方法将返回值为`false`并不会进行导航。Otherwise, calling the method will return a value of `false` and no navigation will occur. 你还可以处理事件以接收通知时属性更改。You can also handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 处理此事件非常有用，例如，若要更改的启用的状态**回**按钮时控件导航到或离开的导航历史记录开头。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来实现**回**按钮控件类似于**回**在 Internet Explorer 中的按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to implement a **Back** button for the control that is similar to the **Back** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`backButton`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `backButton`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法定位如果有可用控制转移到此历史记录中的上一页。The method navigates the control to the previous page in this history, if one is available. 属性指示导航历史记录是否可用以及是否包含前一页。The property indicates whether navigation history is available and contains a previous page. 处理事件以接收通知时属性更改。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 处理此事件非常有用，例如，若要更改的启用的状态**回**按钮时控件导航到或离开的导航历史记录开头。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的处理程序事件来实现**回**按钮控件类似于**回**Internet 中的按钮资源管理器。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to implement a **Back** button for the control that is similar to the **Back** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`backButton`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `backButton`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法定位如果有可用由于以前的向后导航控制转移到此历史记录中的下一页。The method navigates the control to the next page in this history, if one is available as a result of a previous backward navigation. 如果此属性为`true`，则方法将会成功。If this property is `true`, the method will succeed. 否则，调用方法将返回值为`false`并不会进行导航。Otherwise, calling the method will return a value of `false` and no navigation will occur. 使用属性来确定导航历史记录是否可用以及是否包含页之后是当前的页允许方法才能成功。Use the property to determine whether navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one, allowing the method to succeed. 你还可以处理事件以接收通知时属性更改。You can also handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 处理此事件非常有用，例如，若要更改的启用的状态**向前**按钮时控件导航到或离开导航历史记录的末尾。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的处理程序事件来实现**向前**按钮控件类似于**向前**按钮Internet Explorer。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to implement a **Forward** button for the control that is similar to the **Forward** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`ButtonForward`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonForward`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法定位如果有可用由于以前的向后导航控制转移到此历史记录中的下一页。The method navigates the control to the next page in this history, if one is available as a result of a previous backward navigation. 属性指示导航历史记录是否可用以及是否包含页之后是当前的页允许方法才能成功。The property indicates whether navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one, allowing the method to succeed. 处理事件以接收通知时属性更改。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 处理此事件非常有用，例如，若要更改的启用的状态**向前**按钮时控件导航到或离开导航历史记录的末尾。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来实现**向前**按钮控件类似于**向前**Internet 中的按钮资源管理器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Forward** button for the control that is similar to the **Forward** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`ButtonForward`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonForward`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您熟悉 OLE 开发使用非托管`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控件，并且想要扩展的 Windows 窗体功能控件，它是 ActiveX 控件的托管包装器。This method is useful if you are familiar with OLE development using the unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control and you want to extend the functionality of the Windows Forms control, which is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX control. 可以使用此扩展性来实现 ActiveX 控件中未提供的包装器控件的事件。You can use this extensibility to implement events from the ActiveX control that are not provided by the wrapper control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法在派生类中补充正常具有事件`NavigateError`事件从 OLE`DWebBrowserEvents2`接口。The following code example illustrates the use of this method in a class derived from that supplements the normal events with the `NavigateError` event from the OLE `DWebBrowserEvents2` interface. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您熟悉 OLE 开发使用非托管`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控件，并且想要扩展的 Windows 窗体功能控件，它是 ActiveX 控件的托管包装器。This method is useful if you are familiar with OLE development using the unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control and you want to extend the functionality of the Windows Forms control, which is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX control. 可以使用此扩展，例如，若要自定义浏览器键盘快捷方式菜单和快捷方式或提供托管的文档的自定义安全配置。You can use this extensibility, for example, to customize the browser shortcut menu and shortcut keys or to provide a custom security configuration for hosted documents. 若要使用此功能，实现从继承的类和类。To use this feature, implement classes that inherit from the and classes. 非托管`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控件使用受保护方法来检索由实现扩展性接口类。The unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control uses the protected method to retrieve extensibility interfaces implemented by the class. 重写方法以返回自己继承的类的实例类。Override the method to return an instance of your own class that inherits from the class. 类提供 OLE 的默认实现`IDocHostUIHandler`接口。The class provides default implementations of the OLE `IDocHostUIHandler` interface. 可以提供此接口的实现，也可以实现任何其他`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控件接口，以便自定义控件的行为。You can provide your own implementation of this interface or implement any other `WebBrowser` ActiveX control interface in order to customize the behavior of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果提供任何实现`IDocHostUIHandler`成员，必须实现该接口的所有成员。If you provide your own implementation for any `IDocHostUIHandler` members, you must implement all the members of that interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要访问 Web 页面中显示的内容时使用此属性控件通过 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM)。Use this property when you want to access the contents of a Web page displayed in the control through the HTML document object model (DOM). 这很有用，例如，如果想要在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用基于 Web 的控件。This is useful, for example, when you want to use Web-based controls in your Windows Forms application. 可以结合使用此属性，请属性，以显示在网页之间实现双向通信控件和应用程序。You can use this property, in combination with the property, to implement two-way communication between a Web page displayed in the control and your application. 使用方法来调用在网页上从客户端应用程序代码中实现的脚本方法。Use the method to call script methods implemented in a Web page from your client application code. 在脚本编写的代码可以访问你的应用程序通过`window.external`对象，这是用于进行主机访问提供的内置 DOM 对象和其映射到为指定的对象属性。Your scripting code can access your application through the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access, and which maps to an object that you specify for the property. 若要访问字符串形式的网页的内容，请使用属性。To access the contents of a Web page as a string, use the property. 若要访问的网页保存为内容，使用属性。To access the contents of a Web page as a , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的处理程序属性事件以确定是否已填充网页窗体。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a handler for the event to determine whether a Web page form has been filled in. 如果输入的字段不包含一个值，则取消导航。If the input field does not contain a value, the navigation is canceled. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件调用`webBrowser1`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. summary.span: 在 控件完成加载文档时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control finishes loading a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置以下属性之一，或调用方法时，控件导航到新文档：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 处理新文档完成加载时接收通知的事件。Handle the event to receive notification when the new document finishes loading. 当发生事件时，完全加载新文档，这意味着您可以访问通过其内容， ，或属性。When the event occurs, the new document is fully loaded, which means you can access its contents through the , , or property. 若要接收通知，在导航开始前，处理事件。To receive notification before navigation begins, handle the event. 处理此事件可以取消导航，如果某些条件未满足，例如，当用户未填写完窗体。Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form. 处理事件以接收通知时控件完成导航并开始加载新位置上的文档。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此事件，以便完全加载后打印文档。The following code example demonstrates the use of this event to print a document after it has fully loaded. [!code-csharp[WebBrowserMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WebBrowserMisc/CS/WebBrowserMisc.cs#10)] [!code-vb[WebBrowserMisc#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/WebBrowserMisc/vb/WebBrowserMisc.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以加载到网页控件从对象。Use this property to load a Web page into the control from a object. 可用于此属性，例如，从数据库或资源文件中加载网页。You can use this property, for example, to load Web pages from a database or resource file. 当设置此属性，控件自动导航到有关： 空白加载指定的文本之前的 URL。When you set this property, the control automatically navigates to the about:blank URL before loading the specified text. 这意味着， ，并事件发生时设置此属性和值的属性不再是有意义。This means that the , , and events occur when you set this property, and the value of the property is no longer meaningful. > [!NOTE] > 此属性包含当前文档的内容，即使已请求另一个文档。This property contains the contents of the current document, even if another document has been requested. 如果设置此属性的值，然后立即再次检索，检索到的值可能不同于设置如果的值控件具有没有时间来加载新内容。If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the control has not had time to load the new content. 可以检索中的新值事件处理程序。You can retrieve the new value in a event handler. 若要访问字符串形式的网页的内容，请使用属性。To access the contents of a Web page as a string, use the property. 此外可以通过访问使用 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 将页面内容属性。You can also access the page contents using the HTML document object model (DOM) through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要操作的 HTML 页中显示的内容时使用此属性控制使用字符串处理工具。Use this property when you want to manipulate the contents of an HTML page displayed in the control using string processing tools. 若要从数据库加载页或分析使用正则表达式的页，可以使用此属性，例如。You can use this property, for example, to load pages from a database or to analyze pages using regular expressions. 当设置此属性，控件自动导航到有关： 空白加载指定的文本之前的 URL。When you set this property, the control automatically navigates to the about:blank URL before loading the specified text. 这意味着， ，并事件发生时设置此属性和值的属性不再是有意义。This means that the , , and events occur when you set this property, and the value of the property is no longer meaningful. > [!NOTE] > 此属性包含当前文档的文本，即使已请求另一个文档。This property contains the text of the current document, even if another document has been requested. 如果设置此属性的值，然后立即再次检索，检索到的值可能不同于设置如果的值控件具有没有时间来加载新内容。If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the control has not had time to load the new content. 可以检索中的新值事件处理程序。You can retrieve the new value in a event handler. 或者，您可以阻止该线程，直到通过调用加载文档直到循环中的方法属性返回最初将其设置为的值。Alternatively, you can block the thread until the document is loaded by calling the method in a loop until the property returns the value that you originally set it to. 若要访问的网页保存为内容，使用属性。To access the contents of a Web page as a , use the property. 此外可以通过访问使用 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 将页面内容属性。You can also access the page contents using the HTML document object model (DOM) through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式显示所选的文档内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically display document content of your choosing. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件调用`webBrowser1`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性很有用，例如，如果想要在应用程序的标题栏中显示文档标题。This property is useful, for example, when you want to display the document title in the title bar of the application. 如果已为当前文档定义没有标题，此属性设置为文档的位置和文件名。If no title has been defined for the current document, this property is set to the document location and file name. 处理事件以更新标题中的标题栏时控件导航到新文档。Handle the event to update the title in the title bar when the control navigates to a new document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以使用当前文档的标题更新窗体标题栏。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to update the form title bar with the title of the current document. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件调用`webBrowser1`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性与事件以在你的应用程序类似于在 Internet Explorer 中的锁状图标的用户界面中实现一个指示器。You can use this property with the event to implement an indicator in the user interface of your application similar to the lock icon in Internet Explorer. 如果当前文档未加密，此属性的值是。When the current document is not encrypted, the value of this property is . 当控件可以显示包含多个帧具有不同的加密级别的内容的网页，此属性的值是。When the control displays a Web page containing multiple frames with content of different encryption levels, the value of this property is . 未知的加密级别时，此属性的值是。When the encryption level is unknown, the value of this property is . 其他值表示存在加密类型。Other values indicate the type of encryption present. 若要模拟的 Internet Explorer 中的锁状图标的行为，当鼠标指针悬停在该标记上时显示工具提示中显示的加密类型。To mimic the behavior of the lock icon in Internet Explorer, display the encryption type in a ToolTip that appears when the mouse pointer hovers over the indicator.

summary.span: 在 控件导航到或离开使用了加密的网站时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control navigates to or away from a Web site that uses encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用与此事件属性来实现你的应用程序类似于在 Internet Explorer 中的锁状图标的用户界面中的指示器。You can use this event with the property to implement an indicator in the user interface of your application similar to the lock icon in Internet Explorer. 在此事件处理程序中，检查的值属性来确定是否应隐藏或显示的指示器。In a handler for this event, check the value of the property to determine whether you should hide or display the indicator. 若要模拟的 Internet Explorer 中的锁状图标的行为，还可以提供当鼠标指针悬停在指示器时显示的加密级别的工具提示。To mimic the behavior of the lock icon in Internet Explorer, you can also provide a ToolTip that shows the encryption level when the mouse pointer hovers over the indicator. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`WebBrowser1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `WebBrowser1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 如果导航历史记录中的上一页可用，则将 控件导航到该页。

span.span: Navigates the control to the previous page in the navigation history, if one is available.

returns.span: 如果导航成功，则为 ；如果导航历史记录中的上一页不可用，则为 。

span.span: if the navigation succeeds; if a previous page in the navigation history is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 可以使用方法来实现**回**按钮类似于在 Internet Explorer 中，这将允许用户返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。You can use the method to implement a **Back** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer, which will allow your users to return to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用属性来确定导航历史记录是否可用以及是否包含前一页。Use the property to determine whether the navigation history is available and contains a previous page. 处理事件以接收通知时属性值发生更改。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property value changes. 处理此事件非常有用，例如，若要更改的启用的状态**回**按钮时控件导航到或离开的导航历史记录开头。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来实现**回**按钮控件类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Back** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`backButton`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `backButton`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). returns.span: 如果导航成功，则为 ；如果导航历史记录中的下一页不可用，则为 。

span.span: if the navigation succeeds; if a subsequent page in the navigation history is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 可以使用方法来实现**向前**按钮类似于在 Internet Explorer 中，允许用户在向后导航后返回到导航历史记录中的下一页。You can use the method to implement a **Forward** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer, allowing your users to return to the next page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 使用属性来确定导航历史记录是否可用以及是否包含位于后当前页的页。Use the property to determine whether the navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one. 处理事件以接收通知时属性值发生更改。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property value changes. 处理此事件非常有用，例如，若要更改的启用的状态**向前**按钮时控件导航到或离开导航历史记录的末尾。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来实现**向前**按钮控件类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Forward** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`ButtonForward`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonForward`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法来实现**主页**类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个按钮。You can use this method to implement a **Home** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 用户可以指定在主页上**Internet 选项**对话框中，可从控制面板或从**工具**在 Internet Explorer 中的菜单。The user can specify a home page in the **Internet Options** dialog box, which is available from Control Panel or from the **Tools** menu in Internet Explorer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来实现**主页**按钮控件类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Home** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`ButtonHome`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonHome`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void GoSearch() cil managed

summary.span: 将 控件导航到当前用户的默认搜索页。

span.span: Navigates the control to the default search page of the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于实现搜索功能类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个。You can use this method to implement a search feature similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 具体取决于安装的 Internet Explorer 的版本，用户可以指定中的默认搜索页**Internet 选项**对话框中，可从控制面板或从**工具**中的菜单Internet Explorer。Depending on the version of Internet Explorer installed, the user can specify a default search page in the **Internet Options** dialog box, which is available from Control Panel or from the **Tools** menu in Internet Explorer. 注册表中存储的默认搜索页`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Main\Search Page`注册表项。The default search page is stored in the registry under the `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Main\Search Page` registry key. 使用更高版本的 Internet 资源管理器中，必须修改此注册表项，以更改此方法使用的默认搜索页。With later versions of Internet Explorer, this registry key must be modified in order to change the default search page used by this method. 若要使用非默认的搜索页面，请调用方法或指定属性。To use a search page other than the default, call the method or specify the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来实现**搜索**按钮控件类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Search** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`ButtonSearch`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonSearch`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件在用户右键单击它时显示快捷菜单。By default, the control displays a shortcut menu when a user right-clicks it. 作为泛型浏览器使用控件时，此行为很有用。This behavior is useful when you use the control as a generic browser. 如果你想要隐藏正在使用的事实控件，例如若要创建无缝结合了基于 Web 的控件与 Windows 窗体控件的用户界面设置属性设置为 false。If you want to conceal the fact that you are using the control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines Web-based controls with Windows Forms controls, set the property to false. 可以通过设置禁用其他标准的浏览器功能和属性为 false。You can disable other standard browser features by setting the and properties to false. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Navigate(string urlString) cil managed

span.span: The URL of the document to load.

summary.span: 将指定的统一资源定位器 (URL) 处的文档加载到 控件中，替换上一个文档。

span.span: Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into the control, replacing the previous document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当调用此重载控件导航到指定的 URI，并将其添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control navigates to the specified URI and adds it to the end of the history list. 使用方法以将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用方法以向后导航后返回到导航历史记录中的更高版本页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将从最近访问过的网站的 Web 页面存储在本地硬盘上的缓存。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每一页可指定过期日期，该值指示它将保留的时间在缓存中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到页面时，它通过显示缓存的版本，如果可用，而不是重新下载页上节省时间。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以强制控件通过来重新加载当前页面下载它，请确保该控件显示的最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 可以使用方法来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 地址栏。You can use the method to implement an address bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当调用此重载控件导航到指定的 URI，并将其添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control navigates to the specified URI and adds it to the end of the history list. 使用方法以将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用方法以向后导航后返回到导航历史记录中的更高版本页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将从最近访问过的网站的 Web 页面存储在本地硬盘上的缓存。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每一页可指定过期日期，该值指示它将保留的时间在缓存中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到页面时，它通过显示缓存的版本，如果可用，而不是重新下载页上节省时间。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以强制控件通过来重新加载当前页面下载它，请确保该控件显示的最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 可以使用方法来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 地址栏。You can use the method to implement an address bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来实现的地址栏控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement an address bar for the control. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`、 一个控件调用`TextBoxAddress`，和一个控件调用`ButtonGo`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 当在文本框中键入的 URL 并按 ENTER 或单击**转**按钮，控件导航到指定的 URL。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 导航时通过单击超链接，在文本框中将会自动更新以显示当前的 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). span.span: The URL of the document to load.

param.name: newWindow
param.span: 若要将文档加载到浏览器新窗口中，则为 ；若要将文档加载到 控件中，则为 。

span.span: to load the document into a new browser window; to load the document into the control.

summary.span: 将指定的统一资源定位器 (URL) 处的文档加载到浏览器新窗口或 控件中。

span.span: Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into a new browser window or into the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当调用此重载具有`newWindow`的参数值`false`，控件通常情况下导航到指定的 URI，并将 URI 添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload with a `newWindow` parameter value of `false`, the control navigates to the specified URI normally and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 当调用此重载具有`newWindow`的参数值`true`，则控件指定 URI 处的文档加载到新的 Internet Explorer 窗口，可维护其自己的导航历史记录。When you call this overload with a `newWindow` parameter value of `true`, the control loads the document at the specified URI into a new Internet Explorer window, which maintains its own navigation history. 您可以处理事件以前收到通知打开一个新的浏览器窗口，以允许您取消操作，如有必要。You can handle the event to receive notification before a new browser window is opened, allowing you to cancel the action if necessary. 控件将从最近访问过的网站的 Web 页面存储在本地硬盘上的缓存。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每一页可指定过期日期，该值指示它将保留的时间在缓存中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到的页面或将页面加载到一个单独的浏览器窗口时，它通过显示缓存的版本，如果可用，而不是重新下载页上节省时间。When the control navigates to a page or loads a page into a separate browser window, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以强制控件通过来重新加载当前页面下载它，请确保该控件显示的最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 页面加载到一个单独的 Internet Explorer 窗口中，用户可以通过单击检索最新版本**刷新**按钮。When a page is loaded into a separate Internet Explorer window, the user can retrieve the latest version by clicking the **Refresh** button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当调用此重载控件指定 URI 处的文档加载到具有指定名称的网页框架，并将 URI 添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control loads the document at the specified URI into the Web page frame with the specified name, and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 如果指定的框架名称无效，该文档加载到新的 Internet Explorer 窗口中。If the frame name specified is invalid, the document is loaded into a new Internet Explorer window. 使用方法以将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用方法以向后导航后返回到导航历史记录中的更高版本页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将从最近访问过的网站的 Web 页面存储在本地硬盘上的缓存。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每一页可指定过期日期，该值指示它将保留的时间在缓存中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到页面时，它通过显示缓存的版本，如果可用，而不是重新下载页上节省时间。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以强制控件通过来重新加载当前页面下载它，请确保该控件显示的最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.

summary.span: 将指定的统一资源定位器 (URL) 处的文档加载到 控件中，使用指定 HTTP 数据请求该文档并替换具有指定名称的网页框架的内容。

span.span: Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into the control, requesting it using the specified HTTP data and replacing the contents of the Web page frame with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当调用此重载控件指定 URI 处的文档加载到具有指定名称的网页框架，并将 URI 添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control loads the document at the specified URI into the Web page frame with the specified name, and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 如果指定的框架名称无效，该文档加载到新的 Internet Explorer 窗口中。If the frame name specified is invalid, the document is loaded into a new Internet Explorer window. 使用方法以将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用方法以向后导航后返回到导航历史记录中的更高版本页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将从最近访问过的网站的 Web 页面存储在本地硬盘上的缓存。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每一页可指定过期日期，该值指示它将保留的时间在缓存中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到页面时，它通过显示缓存的版本，如果可用，而不是重新下载页上节省时间。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以强制控件通过来重新加载当前页面下载它，请确保该控件显示的最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当调用此重载控件指定 URI 处的文档加载到具有指定名称的网页框架，并将 URI 添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you call this overload, the control loads the document at the specified URI into the Web page frame with the specified name, and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 如果指定的框架名称无效，该文档加载到新的 Internet Explorer 窗口中。If the frame name specified is invalid, the document is loaded into a new Internet Explorer window. 使用方法以将控件返回到导航历史记录中的上一页。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用方法以向后导航后返回到导航历史记录中的更高版本页面。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控件将从最近访问过的网站的 Web 页面存储在本地硬盘上的缓存。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每一页可指定过期日期，该值指示它将保留的时间在缓存中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到页面时，它通过显示缓存的版本，如果可用，而不是重新下载页上节省时间。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以强制控件通过来重新加载当前页面下载它，请确保该控件显示的最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.

summary.span: 在 控件导航到新文档并开始加载该文档时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control has navigated to a new document and has begun loading it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置以下属性之一，或调用方法时，控件导航到新文档：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 处理事件以接收通知时控件已导航到新文档。Handle the event to receive notification when the control has navigated to a new document. 当发生事件时，新的文档已开始加载，这意味着您可以访问已加载的内容经过， ，和属性。When the event occurs, the new document has begun loading, which means you can access the loaded content through the , , and properties. 处理事件以接收通知时控件完成加载新文档。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes loading the new document. 您还可以收到通知，通过处理导航开始前事件。You can also receive notification before navigation begins by handling the event. 处理此事件，可取消导航，如果不满足某些条件，例如，用户未完全填写窗体。Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, the user has not completely filled out a form. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的处理程序事件来实现的地址栏控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to implement an address bar for the control. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`、 一个控件调用`TextBoxAddress`，和一个控件调用`ButtonGo`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 当在文本框中键入的 URL 并按 ENTER 或单击**转**按钮，控件导航到指定的 URL。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 导航时通过单击超链接，在文本框中将会自动更新以显示当前的 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 在 控件导航到新文档之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the control navigates to a new document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置以下属性之一，或调用方法时，控件导航到新文档：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 您可以处理事件取消导航，如果某些条件未满足，例如，当用户未填写完窗体。You can handle the event to cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form. 若要取消导航，请设置的属性对象传递给事件处理程序`true`。To cancel navigation, set the property of the object passed to the event handler to `true`. 此外可以使用此对象来检索通过新的文档的 URL属性。You can also use this object to retrieve the URL of the new document through the property. 如果新文档将显示在网页框架，则可以检索通过框架的名称属性。If the new document will be displayed in a Web page frame, you can retrieve the name of the frame through the property. 处理事件以接收通知时控件完成导航并开始加载新位置上的文档。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location. 处理事件以接收通知时控件完成加载新文档。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes loading the new document. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的处理程序事件取消导航时在未填写网页窗体。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to cancel navigation when a Web page form has not been filled in. 属性用于确定窗体输入的字段是否包含值。The property is used to determine whether the form input field contains a value. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和你窗体的类具有使其可以访问由 com 使用。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and that your form class has a making it accessible to COM. 有关完整的代码示例，可以将以下代码粘贴到，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For a complete code example that you can paste the following code into, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). summary.span: 在浏览器新窗口打开之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a new browser window is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件打开一个单独的浏览器窗口时的适当重载调用方法或当用户单击**在新窗口中打开**的浏览器快捷菜单选项时鼠标指针鼠标指针悬停超链接。The control opens a separate browser window when the appropriate overload of the method is called or when the user clicks the **Open in New Window** option of the browser shortcut menu when the mouse pointer hovers over a hyperlink. 可以通过设置禁用的快捷菜单属性设置为 false。You can disable the shortcut menu by setting the property to false. 事件发生之前打开新的浏览器窗口。The event occurs before the new browser window is opened. 可以处理此事件，例如，若要防止在窗口打开时不满足某些条件。You can handle this event, for example, to prevent the window from opening when certain conditions have not been met. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`WebBrowser1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `WebBrowser1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#651](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#651)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#651](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#651)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象可由显示在 控件中的网页所包含的脚本代码访问。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that can be accessed by scripting code that is contained within a Web page displayed in the control.

value.span: 可用于脚本代码的对象。

span.span: The object being made available to the scripting code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于启用托管的 Web 页面之间的通信控件和应用程序包含控件。Use this property to enable communication between a Web page hosted by the control and the application that contains the control. 此属性允许集成客户端应用程序代码中动态 HTML (DHTML) 代码。This property lets you integrate dynamic HTML (DHTML) code with your client application code. 指定此属性是可用于为网页脚本的对象`window.external`对象，它是用于进行主机访问提供的内置 DOM 对象。The object specified for this property is available to Web page script as the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access. 可以设置想要为其任何 COM 可见对象对其公共属性和方法可用于脚本代码的此属性。You can set this property to any COM-visible object for which you want its public properties and methods available to scripting code. 您可以通过将其与标记使 COM 可见类。You can make a class COM-visible by marking it with the . 若要调用从客户端应用程序代码在网页中定义的函数，使用方法对象可以从检索属性。To call functions defined in your Web page from your client application code, use the method of the object you can retrieve from the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 在示例中，属性设置为当前窗体。In the example, the property is set to the current form. summary.span: 使用当前打印和页面设置打印当前显示在 控件中的文档。

span.span: Prints the document currently displayed in the control using the current print and page settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法来实现**打印**类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个按钮。You can use this method to implement a **Print** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此方法将当前文档打印而无需进一步的用户输入。This method prints the current document without requiring further user input. 若要显示**打印**之前打印，使用对话框的方法。To display the **Print** dialog box prior to printing, use the method. 若要显示**页面设置**对话框中，此对话框允许用户指定标头、 页脚值以及其他页设置，使用方法。To display the **Page Setup** dialog box, which lets your users specify header and footer values and other page settings, use the method. 若要显示**打印预览**对话框中，使用方法。To display the **Print Preview** dialog box, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来实现**打印**按钮控件类似于**打印**在 Internet Explorer 中的按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Print** button for the control that is similar to the **Print** button in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`ButtonPrint`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonPrint`. summary.span: 在 控件已更新有关要导航到的文档的下载进度的信息时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control has updated information on the download progress of a document it is navigating to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此事件的处理程序来实现类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个导航进度栏。You can use a handler for this event to implement a navigation progress bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 使用属性来确定已成功下载的字节数。Use the property to determine the number of bytes that have been downloaded successfully. 使用属性来确定可供下载的字节总数。Use the property to determine the total number of bytes available for downloading. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`WebBrowser1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `WebBrowser1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 重新加载当前显示在 控件中的文档。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 通过检查服务器获取更新版本，重新加载当前显示在 控件中的文档。

span.span: Reloads the document currently displayed in the control by checking the server for an updated version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将从最近访问过的网站的 Web 页面存储在本地硬盘上的缓存。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每一页可指定过期日期，该值指示它将保留的时间在缓存中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到页面时，它通过显示缓存的版本，如果可用，而不是重新下载页上节省时间。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 方法强制控件通过来重新加载当前页面下载它，请确保该控件显示的最新版本。The method forces the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 可以使用此方法来实现**刷新**类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个按钮。You can use this method to implement a **Refresh** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer. > [!NOTE] > 文档刷新只重新加载当前页上，因此， ，并事件在调用时不会发生方法。A document refresh simply reloads the current page, so the , , and events do not occur when you call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来实现**刷新**按钮控件类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Refresh** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`和一个控件调用`ButtonRefresh`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonRefresh`. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[如何：将 Web 浏览器功能添加到 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#10)]

span.span: Reloads the document currently displayed in the control using the specified refresh options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将最近访问过的 Web 页面存储在本地硬盘上的缓存。The control stores recently visited Web pages in a cache on the local hard disk. 每一页可指定过期日期，该值指示它将保留的时间在缓存中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到页面时，它通过显示缓存的版本，如果可用，而不是重新下载页上节省时间。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 方法强制控件来重新加载当前页面。The method forces the control to reload the current page. 重新加载的类型取决于指定值。The type of reload depends on the value specified. 如果您调用方法替换下载值，该文档的最新版本。If you call the method with the value, the latest version of the document is downloaded. 如果使用值，最新版本下载仅当当前文档已过期。If you use the value, the latest version is downloaded only if the current document has expired. 如果使用值，服务器发送的文档存储在其自己的缓存副本。If you use the value, the server sends a copy of the document stored in its own cache. > [!NOTE] > 文档刷新只重新加载当前页上，因此， ，并事件在调用时不会发生方法。A document refresh simply reloads the current page, so the , , and events do not occur when you call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`false`调试中显示的网页控件。Set this property to `false` to debug Web pages that you display in the control. 使用该控件将基于 Web 的控件和脚本编写的代码添加到你的应用程序时，这很有用。This is useful when you use the control to add Web-based controls and scripting code to your application. 它是作为泛型浏览器使用控件时不太有用。It is less useful when you use the control as a generic browser. 当您已完成调试应用程序，此属性设置为`true`以取消显示脚本错误。When you have finished debugging your application, set this property to `true` to suppress script errors. > [!NOTE] > 当设置为`true`，则控件隐藏所有其对话框来自基础 ActiveX 控件，而不仅仅是编写脚本的错误。When is set to `true`, the control hides all its dialog boxes that originate from the underlying ActiveX control, not just script errors. 有时您可能需要禁止显示对话框，如所使用的浏览器安全设置和用户登录时显示脚本错误。Occasionally you might need to suppress script errors while displaying dialog boxes such as those used for browser security settings and user login. 在这种情况下，设置到`false`并禁止显示的处理程序中的脚本错误事件。In this case, set to `false` and suppress script errors in a handler for the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的代码示例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何取消显示脚本错误，而无需取消显示其他对话框。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress script errors without suppressing other dialog boxes. 在示例中，属性设置为`false`以确保显示对话框。In the example, the property is set to `false` to ensure that dialog boxes are displayed. 处理程序事件禁止显示错误。A handler for the event suppresses the error. 此事件才可访问，当文档已完成加载，因此处理程序附加在事件处理程序。This event is only accessible when a document is finished loading, so the handler is attached in a event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性等效于调用方法并将其传递指定的 URL。Setting this property is equivalent to calling the method and passing it the specified URL. 控件保持所有浏览会话期间访问的网页的历史记录列表。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 当您将设置属性，控件导航到指定的 URL，并将其添加到历史记录列表的末尾。When you set the property, the control navigates to the specified URL and adds it to the end of the history list. 控件将从最近访问过的网站的 Web 页面存储在本地硬盘上的缓存。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每一页可指定过期日期，该值指示它将保留的时间在缓存中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 当控件导航到页面时，它通过显示缓存的版本，如果可用，而不是重新下载页上节省时间。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以强制控件通过来重新加载当前页面下载它，请确保该控件显示的最新版本。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. > [!NOTE] > 此属性包含当前文档的 URL，即使已请求另一个文档。This property contains the URL of the current document, even if another document has been requested. 如果设置此属性的值，然后立即再次检索，检索到的值可能不同于设置如果的值控件尚未时才加载新文档。If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the control has not had time to load the new document. 可以检索中的新值事件处理程序。You can retrieve the new value in a event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来实现的地址栏控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to implement an address bar for the control. 此示例要求你的窗体包含控件称为`webBrowser1`、 一个控件调用`TextBoxAddress`，和一个控件调用`ButtonGo`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 当在文本框中键入的 URL 并按 ENTER 或单击**转**按钮，控件导航到指定的 URL。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 导航时通过单击超链接，在文本框中将会自动更新以显示当前的 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. summary.span: 获取所安装的 Internet Explorer 的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of Internet Explorer installed.

span.span: A object representing the version of Internet Explorer installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件是随 Internet Explorer 一起安装的组件的托管的包装。The control is a managed wrapper around a component installed with Internet Explorer. 使用此属性来确定安装哪个版本的 Internet Explorer。Use this property to determine which version of Internet Explorer is installed. 当你的应用程序使用仅在某些版本中存在的 Internet Explorer 的一项功能时，这很有用。This is useful when your application uses a feature of Internet Explorer that is present only in certain versions. 如果所需的版本不存在于本地计算机上，可以提供替代功能或提示用户进行升级。If the required version is not present on the local machine, you can provide alternative functionality or prompt the user to upgrade.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 false 可阻止用户使用 Internet Explorer 键盘快捷方式与控件。Set this property to false to prevent your users from using Internet Explorer keyboard shortcuts with the control. 如果想要隐藏正在使用的事实，这是有用控件，例如若要创建无缝结合了基于 DHTML 的控件与 Windows 窗体控件的用户界面。This is useful when you want to conceal the fact that you are using the control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines DHTML-based controls with Windows Forms controls. 可以通过设置禁用其他标准的浏览器功能并属性设置为`false`。You can disable other standard browser features by setting the and properties to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property.
